The Thai: language message translates to English as: “The route downhill from Pak Thong Chai District No. 304 from Sattaheep to Korat, they are probably dead. Poor them.”
The video features the logo of Ruptly: the Berlin-based video branch of Russia’s state-owned RT television network.
The video was also published on Ruptly: s official YouTube account with a headline indicating a fatal truck crash in Chelyabinsk, Russia.
